metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10155 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
The Libreswan Project has found a vulnerability in the processing of IKEv1informational exchange packets which are encrypted and integrity protectedusing the established IKE SA encryption and integrity keys, but as areceiver, the integrity check value was not verified. This issue affectsversions before 3.29.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10155` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libreswan - 3.27-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libreswan package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.27-6').
